titles: A general treatise of artillery, or, Great ordnance writ in Italian by Tomaso Morretii ... ; translated into English, with notes thereupon, and some additions out of French for sea-gunners, by Sir Jonas Moore, Kt. ; with an appendix of artificial fire-works for war and delight, by Sir Abraham Dager ...
author: Moretti, Tomaso, d. 1675.
Moore, Jonas, Sir, 1617-1679.
Dager, Abraham, Sir.
Fournier, Georges, 1595-1652. Hydrographie contenant la theorie et la pratique de toutes les parties de la navigation.
publisher: Printed by A.G. and J.P. for Obadiah Blagrave ...,
notes: Translation of the author's Trattato dell' artiglieria.
"Advice for ship-gunners, out of Furnier's Hydrography, p. 95": p. 102.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
